Title: Love Comes to Royston Vasey
Plot: Ben tries to escape from the Dentons. Henry and Ally go to the wrong film but try to make the best of it. Geoff gives a very truthful and upsetting speech at Mike's wedding.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh
